description: Latin spatiātus, past participle of spatior (“walk around, spread out”), from spatium (“space, room”). Compare spaziare, spazieren.

verbs.description: spatiate (third-person singular simple present spatiates, present participle spatiating, simple past and past participle spatiated)

examples: My spirit feels her freedom, shakes her wings, / Exults and spatiates o'er a thousand scenes […]
